hypergraphx.representations package#

Submodules#

hypergraphx.representations.projections module#

hypergraphx.representations.projections.bipartite_projection(h: Hypergraph)[source]#

Returns a bipartite graph representation of the hypergraph.

Parameters

h (Hypergraph) – The hypergraph to be projected.

Returns

The bipartite graph representation of the hypergraph.

Return type

networkx.Graph

hypergraphx.representations.projections.clique_projection(h: Hypergraph, keep_isolated=False)[source]#

Returns a clique projection of the hypergraph.

Parameters

  • h (Hypergraph) – The hypergraph to be projected.

  • keep_isolated (bool) – Whether to keep isolated nodes or not.

Returns

The clique projection of the hypergraph.

Return type

networkx.Graph

Notes

Computing the clique projection can be very expensive for large hypergraphs.

Example

>>> import networkx as nx
>>> from hypergraphx.core.hypergraph import Hypergraph
>>> from hypergraphx.representations.projections import clique_projection
>>>
>>> h = Hypergraph()
>>> h.add_nodes([1, 2, 3, 4, 5])
>>> h.add_edges([(1, 2), (1, 2, 3), (3, 4, 5)])
>>> g = clique_projection(h)
>>> g.edges()
EdgeView([(1, 2), (1, 3), (2,3), (3, 4), (3, 5), (4, 5)])
hypergraphx.representations.projections.line_graph(h: Hypergraph, distance='intersection', s=1, weighted=False)[source]#

Returns a line graph of the hypergraph.

Parameters

  • h (Hypergraph) – The hypergraph to be projected.

  • distance (str) – The distance function to be used. Can be ‘intersection’ or ‘jaccard’.

  • s (float) – The threshold for the distance function.

  • weighted (bool) – Whether the line graph should be weighted or not.

Returns

The line graph of the hypergraph.

Return type

networkx.Graph

Notes

Computing the line graph can be very expensive for large hypergraphs.

hypergraphx.representations.simplicial module#

hypergraphx.representations.simplicial.get_all_subsets(s)[source]#

Returns all subsets of a set. :param s: :type s: set. The set to get all subsets of.

Returns

subsets

Return type

list. All subsets of the set.

Returns a simplicial complex representation of the hypergraph. :param h: :type h: Hypergraph. The hypergraph to be projected.

S

Hypergraph. The simplicial complex representation of the hypergraph.
